content: chrysanthemum is a slouchy double-knitted hat making it reversible it uses an invisible 2-color cast on that results in a clean cast on edge 2 crown options are provided one patterned and one plain shown in the pictures is the patterned crown it includes charts and basic instructions along with links to double-knitting techniques test knitted only by me the design is adapted from kaffe fassett s pattern library thank you marianneho /people/marianneho for translating the pattern to danish
